{{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=16:16 13 Feb 2008 |action1link=Talk:Bob Chappuis#GA review |action1result=Listed |action1oldid=191134245 |action2=FAC |action2date=00:24, 24 April 2008 |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Bob Chappuis/archive1 |action2result=not promoted |action2oldid=206693085 |action3=FAC |action3date=21:48, 6 December 2008 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Bob Chappuis/archive2 |action3result=not promoted |action3oldid=255781428 |action4=WAR |action4date=12:17, 9 January 2009 |action4link=Wikipedia: WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Bob Chappuis |action4result=approved |action4oldid=262202648 | topic = everydaylife |dykdate=4 January 2008 |currentstatus=GA }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|blp=no|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=no |class=GA |sports-work-group=yes|sports-priority=mid |military-work-group=yes |military-priority=low |listas=Chappuis, Bob }} {{WikiProject College football|class=GA |importance=high}} {{WikiProject Chicago|class= GA|importance=low}} {{WPMILHIST|class=A|A-Class=pass|US=yes|Biography=yes|WWII=yes}} {{WikiProject National Football League|class=GA|importance=Low|priority=}} {{WikiProject United States|class=A|importance=low|OH=yes|OH-importance=low}} }} ==Auto peer review== The following suggestions were generated by a semi-automatic [[User:AndyZ/peerreviewer|javascript program]], and might not be applicable for the article in question. *Please expand the lead to conform with guidelines at [[Wikipedia:Lead]]. The article should have an appropriate number of paragraphs as is shown on [[WP:LEAD]], and should adequately summarize the article.[[User:AndyZ/G#lead|[?]]]{{Y}}--[[User:TonyTheTiger|TonyTheTiger]] ([[User talk:TonyTheTiger|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/TonyTheTiger|c]]/[[User:TonyTheTiger/Antonio Vernon|bio]]/[[WP:CHICAGO]]/[[WP:LOTD]]) 07:33, 31 December 2007 (UTC) *Per [[Wikipedia:Only make links that are relevant to the context|Wikipedia:Context]] and [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style (dates and numbers)|Wikipedia:Manual of Style (dates)]], months and days of the week generally should not be linked. Years, decades, and centuries can be linked if they provide [[WP:CONTEXT|context]] for the article.[[User:AndyZ/G#contxt|[?]]] *This article has no or few [[WP:IMAGE|images]]. Please see if there are any [[WP:IT|free use]] images that fall under the [[Wikipedia:Image use policy]] and fit under one of the [[Wikipedia:Image copyright tags]] that can be uploaded. To upload images on Wikipedia, go to [[Special:Upload]]; to upload non-[[WP:FU|fair use]] images on the [[Wikimedia Commons]], go to [[commons:special:upload]].[[User:AndyZ/G#noimg|[?]]]{{Y}}--[[User:TonyTheTiger|TonyTheTiger]] ([[User talk:TonyTheTiger|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/TonyTheTiger|c]]/[[User:TonyTheTiger/Antonio Vernon|bio]]/[[WP:CHICAGO]]/[[WP:LOTD]]) 07:45, 31 December 2007 (UTC) *You may wish to consider adding an appropriate [[WP:INFOBOX|infobox]] for this article, if one exists relating to the topic of the article. [[User:AndyZ/G#infobox|[?]]] (Note that there might not be an applicable infobox; remember that these suggestions are not generated manually){{Y}}--[[User:TonyTheTiger|TonyTheTiger]] ([[User talk:TonyTheTiger|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/TonyTheTiger|c]]/[[User:TonyTheTiger/Antonio Vernon|bio]]/[[WP:CHICAGO]]/[[WP:LOTD]]) 07:45, 31 December 2007 (UTC) *If this article is about a person, please add {{persondata|PLEASE SEE [[WP:PDATA]]!}} along with the required parameters to the article - see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]] for more information.[[User:AndyZ/G#persondata|[?]]] *Per [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style (dates and numbers)#Units of measurement|Wikipedia:Manual of Style (numbers)]], there should be a non-breaking space -   between a number and the unit of measurement. For example, instead of ''0 yards'', use ''0 yards'', which when you are editing the page, should look like: 0 yards.[[User:AndyZ/G#nbsp|[?]]] *Per [[Wikipedia:Only make links that are relevant to the context|Wikipedia:Context]] and [[Wikipedia:Build the web]], years with full dates should be linked; for example, if January 15, 2006 appeared in the article, link it as [[January 15]], [[2006]].[[User:AndyZ/G#linkdate|[?]]] *Per [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style (headings)]], headings generally do not start with articles ('the', 'a(n)'). For example, if there was a section called ''==The Biography=='', it should be changed to ''==Biography==''.[[User:AndyZ/G#headingthe|[?]]]{{Y}}--[[User:TonyTheTiger|TonyTheTiger]] ([[User talk:TonyTheTiger|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/TonyTheTiger|c]]/[[User:TonyTheTiger/Antonio Vernon|bio]]/[[WP:CHICAGO]]/[[WP:LOTD]]) 07:49, 31 December 2007 (UTC) *Please reorder/rename the last few sections to follow guidelines at [[Wikipedia:Guide to layout]].[[User:AndyZ/G#gtl|[?]]]{{Y}}--[[User:TonyTheTiger|TonyTheTiger]] ([[User talk:TonyTheTiger|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/TonyTheTiger|c]]/[[User:TonyTheTiger/Antonio Vernon|bio]]/[[WP:CHICAGO]]/[[WP:LOTD]]) 07:51, 31 December 2007 (UTC) *As done in [[WP:FOOTNOTE]], footnotes usually are located right after a punctuation mark (as recommended by the [[The Chicago Manual of Style|CMS]], but not mandatory), such that there is no space in between. For example, ''the sun is larger than the moon [2].'' is usually written as ''the sun is larger than the moon.[2]''[[User:AndyZ/G#footspace|[?]]]{{Y}}--[[User:TonyTheTiger|TonyTheTiger]] ([[User talk:TonyTheTiger|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/TonyTheTiger|c]]/[[User:TonyTheTiger/Antonio Vernon|bio]]/[[WP:CHICAGO]]/[[WP:LOTD]]) 07:53, 31 December 2007 (UTC) *Please ensure that the article has gone through a thorough copyediting so that it exemplifies some of [[WP:WIAFA|Wikipedia's best work]]. See also [[User:Tony1/How to satisfy Criterion 1a]].[[User:AndyZ/G#copyedit|[?]]] You may wish to browse through [[User:AndyZ/Suggestions]] for further ideas. Thanks, [[User:TonyTheTiger|TonyTheTiger]] ([[User talk:TonyTheTiger|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/TonyTheTiger|c]]/[[User:TonyTheTiger/Antonio Vernon|bio]]/[[WP:CHICAGO]]/[[WP:LOTD]]) 04:27, 31 December 2007 (UTC) ==Family section== Is a bit short. I'm just trying to imagine where it could be integrated... -- [[User:Anonymous Dissident|Anonymous Dissident]][[User_talk:Anonymous Dissident|Talk]] 22:18, 3 January 2008 (UTC) : Chappuis appears to be a very private person. I found only one reference to his wife and kids in dozens of articles about him. Given the shortness of the section, is it best to integrate?[[User:Cbl62|Cbl62]] ([[User talk:Cbl62|talk]]) 22:48, 3 January 2008 (UTC) ==GA review== {{#if:|{{#ifeq:{{NAMESPACE}}|Talk||{{error:not substituted|GAList}}
}}}} :'''[[Wikipedia:Good article nominations|GA]] review''' (see [[Wikipedia:What is a good article?|here]] for criteria) {{#if:Just a few short things|
Just a few short things|}} #It is '''reasonably well written'''. #:a ''(prose)'': {{GAList/check|aye}} b ''([[Wikipedia:Manual of Style|MoS]])'': {{GAList/check|aye}} #:: {{#if:few prose tweaks|few prose tweaks|}} #It is '''factually accurate''' and '''[[Wikipedia:Verifiability|verifiable]]'''. #:a ''(references)'': {{GAList/check|aye}} b ''(citations to [[WP:RS|reliable sources]])'': {{GAList/check|aye}} c ''([[Wikipedia:No original research|OR]])'': {{GAList/check|aye}} #:: {{#if:couple of quotes need citations|couple of quotes need citations|}} #It is '''broad in its coverage'''. #:a ''(major aspects)'': {{GAList/check|aye}} b ''(focused)'': {{GAList/check|aye}} #:: {{#if:|{{{3com}}}|}} #It follows the '''[[WP:NPOV|neutral point of view]] policy'''. #:''Fair representation without bias'': {{GAList/check|aye}} #:: {{#if:|{{{4com}}}|}} #It is '''stable'''. #:''No edit wars etc.'': {{GAList/check|aye}} #:: {{#if:|{{{5com}}}|}} #It is illustrated by '''[[Wikipedia:Images|images]]''', where possible and appropriate. #:a ''(images are tagged and non-free images have [[Wikipedia:Image_description_page#Use_rationale|fair use rationales]])'': {{GAList/check|aye}} b ''(appropriate use with [[WP:CAP|suitable captions]])'': {{GAList/check|aye}} #:: {{#if:|{{{6com}}}|}} #'''Overall''': #:''Pass/Fail'': {{GAList/check|aye}} #:: {{#if:|{{{7com}}}|}}
Details: * Citation on the "so long as it wasn't Ohio State" quote in the Early years section.{{Y}}--[[User:Cbl62|Cbl62]] ([[User talk:Cbl62|talk]]) 06:31, 13 February 2008 (UTC) * [[Template:Persondata]] {{Y}}--[[User:Cbl62|Cbl62]] ([[User talk:Cbl62|talk]]) 06:19, 13 February 2008 (UTC) * I got some of the ndashes. You can get the rest. **I think they're all fixed, but I'm not that familiar with "n dash" protcol. Other than connecting years, i.e., 1945-1946, when else is it used? Would it be used for example when refering to a score of 40-0 or a record of 11-0? {{Y}}--[[User:Cbl62|Cbl62]] ([[User talk:Cbl62|talk]]) 06:41, 13 February 2008 (UTC) ***See [[WP:DASH]]. I found a few more.--[[User:TonyTheTiger|TonyTheTiger]] ([[User talk:TonyTheTiger|t]]/[[Special:Contributions/TonyTheTiger|c]]/[[User:TonyTheTiger/Antonio Vernon|bio]]/[[WP:CHICAGO]]/[[WP:LOTD]]) 13:40, 13 February 2008 (UTC) * College Football in 1942 section, Who is Tom Harmon and why is the comparision important to Chappuis? **I revised to include info on Harmon's status as Chappuis' predecessor and Heisman Trophy winner. {{Y}}--[[User:Cbl62|Cbl62]] ([[User talk:Cbl62|talk]]) 06:23, 13 February 2008 (UTC) * 1947 season subsection has a number of stubby short paragraphs. {{Y}}--[[User:Cbl62|Cbl62]] ([[User talk:Cbl62|talk]]) 06:27, 13 February 2008 (UTC) * Passing specialist subsection, the quote staring "endowed with a passer's sixth sense.." needs a citation on it.{{Y}}--[[User:Cbl62|Cbl62]] ([[User talk:Cbl62|talk]]) 06:31, 13 February 2008 (UTC) * A few other short paragraphs throughout the article that might be combined or expanded, but nothing that just jumps at me badly. * Consider staggering the pics on both sides of the article to make it feel less like a column on the right side {{Y}}--[[User:Cbl62|Cbl62]] ([[User talk:Cbl62|talk]]) 06:27, 13 February 2008 (UTC) I've put the article on hold for seven days to allow folks to address the issues I've brought up. Feel free to contact me on my talk page, or here with any concerns, and let me know one of those places when the issues have been addressed. If I may suggest that you strike out, check mark, or otherwise mark the items I've detailed, that will make it possible for me to see what's been addressed, and you can keep track of what's been done and what still needs to be worked on.[[User:Ealdgyth|Ealdgyth]] | [[User talk:Ealdgyth|Talk]] 16:43, 12 February 2008 (UTC) Looks good, passing it now. [[User:Ealdgyth|Ealdgyth]] | [[User talk:Ealdgyth|Talk]] 16:18, 13 February 2008 (UTC) == Help Please == I can't figure out how to fix reference number 48, which is embedded in the last paragraph under "After Football." If anyone can fix the ref please do (and, if you feel like doing me a favour, let me know where I messed up on my talk page). [[User:Guyovski|Guyovski]] ([[User talk:Guyovski|talk]]) 20:50, 15 June 2012 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Bob Chappuis]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=700915321 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20080409133154/http://www.heisman.com:80/winners/j-lujack47.html to http://www.heisman.com/winners/j-lujack47.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 11:15, 21 January 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Bob Chappuis]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=747864837 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20080428235120/http://www.umich.edu:80/~newsinfo/MT/96/Fall96/mta11f96.html to http://www.umich.edu/~newsinfo/MT/96/Fall96/mta11f96.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 20:54, 4 November 2016 (UTC)
